12.content: Whic Demi-god are you with?
12.title: Demigods

choices: You wake up to a half-man half-horse.
You get dumped with cold water.
121.content:
To my surprise I didn't think that camp would be the best place for me but now that changed once my step father was killed by some woman that had blue streaks in her black hair and wings. Then my mother ran over to me and pushed through the forest only to have her snatched up by another one of those bird-like women. But soon after I faded to unconsciousness, then as I woke up I noticed this white-streaked raven haired man sitting next to me while a blonde haired woman with gray eyes was spoon feeding me a yellow liquid. To my shock it tasted like, my mom's home-made birthday cake ice cream. As I got up, I notice that my head hasn't completely been recovered and I was feeling a major headache. The blonde haired woman asked if I was alright. I was about to say yes when my head started to hurt more. I clutched on to my head then I open my eyes to see that blonde haired woman, white-streaked raven haired man, and everything around me was levitating. I said I'm sorry and my shock made everything fall. Then from lack of energy I passed of again.

What happens next?
121.title: New Camper

1212.content: Then from lack of energy you passed of again. But this time you get a rude awakening with some ice cold water. That woke you up real quick. And that made your anger rose, but it was short lived seeing that white-streaked raven haired man was now holding his head in pain. Like someone slapped him upside the head and my guess it would be the glaring blonde-haired woman with grey eyes. That same woman even gave me a towel to help me dry off. She asked me what was my name. And I told her it was Jacob Miliano. But to my surprise she asked me who was my godly parent which I thought was weird. I said I didn't know. But I felt a strange almost homey sensation right over my head. I looked up and it was a golden bow and arrow. Then the white-streaked raven haired man said "Apollo". Then that's when my mind went to back to what I learned when I was in sixth grade. You mean the Greek/Roman god of the sun, Healing, Music, Poetry, and lastly Prophoecy. I replied back to the man "Yep, that's the one." he gave back. He told me that his name was Percy Jackson, Son of Poseidon. And this is Annabeth Chase, Daughter of Athena. Percy gestering to the blonde haired woman sitting next to me. They asked me what happen and I told them everything. Then they both muttered "Sirens" hoping that I didn't hear them. They asked me did anything else unsual happen to me. I then said I have powers sort of. Then Percy asked me what they were. And I told him that I was heavy on the.......
1212.title: You get dumped with cold water.

12121.content: Then Percy asked me what they were. And I told him that I was heavy on the psiionic types. And he asked me what that meant. I told him I had telepathy, empathy, telekinesis, creativity, premonition, invisibility, intangibility, pathokinesis , force-field generation. This kind of took Percy by surprise, and he asked that I had any physical powers but all I said that I had a healing factor which everyone has and that I could turned my body in to pure diamond but that will also cut off my mental abilities. And I also have audiokinesis along with astral projection and biokinesis.Percy soon understood this likely every thing must have a drawback at some point. Then he directed me through the entire camp and finally came a stop at the weapons inventory. He told me to pick a weapon. But as I looked around I found something that would really suit me. And I choose the...
12121.title: Mental Abilities

choices: Percy takes you to his cabin
Percy takes you to meet Nico, Jason, Grover
121211.content:
And I choose the sword and shield, for some reason the sword gave off an pulsing sensation that ran through my whole entire body. As I picked up the shield it seem like it was calling for me. But my mind was soon pulled back into reality once Chiron, started the sword battling challenge. And to very much dissappointment it was Percy. As we began fighting, I was soon noticed that I was on the defensive and trying to get away from Percy's forcive swing and slash. But then I realize that their was a pattern for his way of attack. After a quick measure of distance between us I charged in dodging almost all of his blows, but coming along with some scratches. I soon low kicked his knee and took his unbalanced as a sign then jumped over him which landed my foot on his chest. I placed my sword up to his neck and said "Yield now Percy Jackson." in a normal tone. You could practically see Percy sweat dropped to his face. "Alright, I give up." Percy soon replied back shocking everyone that defeated their strongest swordsman here. Then I asked him a question telepathically saying "Is Annabeth your girlfriend or something?" Percy soon replied back saying"No, she isn't. She likes Mitchell, one of the aphrodite kids." "Well, who do you like then?" I asked Percy soon had a smirk on his face saying, well he has long raven black hair, emerald green eyes that look like seafoam, he is light skinned, he is skinny, and he is a psychic.Can you guess?" "Me, You like me." I replied back only to have him say this"how about this, I hope it will help." then Percy knocked away me sword as soon as everyone left the field, you got off of Percy then used your telekinesis to levitate him up from the ground do he could stand. Then we lefted the field to head down to the mess hall.

What happens next?
121211.title: Sword and Shield

1212112.content: You and Percy hitted off pretty well and then you see a raven haired boy with tan skinned teenaged boy with deep brown eyes walking with a golden blonde haired teenaged with tanned skin and with electric blue eyes and a curly auburn haired teenaged boy that seem to have goat legs. "Oh Percy, I see you found us another lover to join us." stated the golden blonde haired teenaged boy. "If only if wants us too Jason, and Nico, Groverwhat are you doing aren't you supposed to be with Hades right now!"Percy replied back to Jason and I looked over to see the dark raven haired boy with deep brown chocolate eyes placing his arms around me. That's when I found out that this person was Nico and the curly auburn teenaged boy was named Grover. "L-L-Lover, what do mean by that?" I Stuttered "Aww, you even stutter cute!" Nico replied back and saying that the Oracle prophesied that the male Demi-god children of Posidon, Zeus, and Hades will find a male child of Apollo, that will become their eternal mate and help them become stronger than their original fathers. It also said that we will be literally be connected through the mind. "Oh is that all then I would say
1212112.title: Percy takes you to meet Nico, Jason, Grover

1213.content: So you want a different storyline than this, huh?
1213.title: More

12131.content:
It wasn't long after the defeat of Mother Earth, or commonly known as Gaia. That the second war was officially over. With that being said now there's this era of peace for both camps. That was until this mysterious force magically removed the females of either Camp and no one including the gods were the wiser. As the full moon rose into the air for tonight's bonfire. Something strange happens to our beloved demigods.

What happens to them?
12131.title: Story 2

12132.content:
Percy moaned as the sunlight filtered through the windows of cabin number three at Camp Half Blood. It was a Saturday so their was no big rush to get out of bed. He laid there for a while letting the sun wash over his body. Finally with a great groan Percy heaved himself from bed. He had recently taken to just sleeping in his powder blue boxers which he now roughly scratched his junk through before scratching his rear. Was it his imagination, or was there a bit of a jiggle back there? Percy shook it off and started to get dressed. Percy pulled his blue jeans up, but he struggled a little to get them around his butt. "I have a little more junk in the trunk than I used to" thought Percy as he finally got his tight jeans buttoned. Next Percy pulled his orange camp half blood shirt over his. The size medium was a lot tighter and more form fitting than it used to be. Percy turned to look at himself in the mirror, his huge thighs were squeezed like sausages into his jeans and his slightly flabby chest filled out his shirt. The biggest difference in Percy though was his belly which was bulging out over his waistband.

Does Percy thinks it's new Muscle or Does he Know he is getting fat?
12132.title: Story 3

choices: Give into his hunger ( Heads to brunch )
Ignore his hunger and go out for a run
121321.content:
Percy blinked.
What?
He stared open-mouthed, gaping at himself in the mirror. Had he really gained that much?
Percy hesitantly poked his protruding belly, blinking once more at how soft and squishy it was.
No. Impossible.
He knew he should've felt ashamed, maybe even disgusted at himself, but no. He wasn't ashamed at all. He was curious.
Tentatively, he slipped a hand under his gut (yeah, it was classified as a gut now). He heaved it upward, then quickly let it fall, watching in awe as it jiggled playfully.
Oh gods. Did he actually like this?
His thoughts were interrupted when the bulging globe itself gave a low rumble, as if saying, Hey, I'm hungry. Feed me, man.
Percy frowned, considering the options. He could submit to his hunger and possibly gain even more weight, or ignore it and go for a run in hopes of burning off some fat.
Which one should he choose?
121321.title: He knows

1213211.content:
Percy slipped out of Cabin 2, only realizing half way to the pavilion he should've worn a hoodie to hide his recent weight gain. He sighed inwardly, tugging down his tight Camp tee.
"Hey, Perce!"
Said demigod turned to the voice to see the one and only Will Solace running toward him, waving with a cheerful smile on his face.
Percy waved back, hoping the son of Apollo didn't notice the lack of enthusiasm he put into it. "Hey, Will. What's up?"
Will shrugged as he easily caught up with him. "Nothing much. Are you heading to lunch, too?"
Percy nodded, relieved that Will hadn't noticed the extra pounds he'd packed on.
"H-Hey, what...?" Will studied Percy's softer face, then glanced as his thicker arms and legs, his blue eyes ultimately landing on the not-so-subtle curve of his stomach. He placed a hand over the bulge, grinning playfully. "What's this, Percy?" He gave it two gentle pats, causing it to jiggle in response.
Percy's cheeks burned, tinted with scarlet. "U-Um, nothing, Will."
Will chuckled, patting him on the back reassuringly. "Don't worry about it, Perce. It actually looks really good on you, as strange as that might sound."
Percy's brows furrowed. "Seriously? I'm... fat and you're saying I look good?" He asked, bewildered.
"I'm sure it's not just me who thinks so. I mean," The blonde motioned around to nearby campers heading to the pavilion. "Look, they're all looking at you, and they're practically drooling."
It was true. All the other demigods were staring dreamily at their now-chubby hero.
"Okay, look, all I'm going to say is, you look great, thin or chunky. It's up to you whether you want to stay this way, or go back to your old, lean self." Will finished, and without waiting for Percy to respond, sprinted off.
Percy had yet another decision to make. Get back into shape, or continue to get out of shape.
Which one should he choose?
1213211.title: Give into his hunger ( Heads to brunch )

12132112.content:
Percy sat down at lunch, deciding not to eat much, but a nymph deposited a burger on his plate. He sighed. "I suppose one burger won't make too much difference, and I can always work out a bit afterwards..." He wolfed down the burger, then had another one... And another... Finally, he stood up, his gut now poking out from under his t-shirt. He looked around; most people had already left. He decided to go back to his cabin and take a nap; he could always work out later, and he was tired.
In his cabin, he noticed how his belly was starting to hang over his belt. He took his shirt off, revealing small man-boobs. He sat down and absentmindedly began to play with his new flab. He was worried about what Annabeth would think when she got back...
12132112.title: Pig out at Lunch

121322.content: So more choices, huh? Well let's have some fun here? Just look down below, and there you go?
121322.title: More

1213221.content:
"All that working out is is paying off" said Percy as he flexed his bulging bicep "I have really put on some muscle' well most of its muscle anyway" he muttered as he patted his belly.

What does Percy do now?
1213221.title: He thinks he's getting Buff

choices: Annabeth is visibly shocked and a bit grossed out
Annabeth doesn't tell him and is a bit uncomfortable
1213222.content:
Percy frowned at his reflection, not seeming to understand what was off. He knew Annabeth would tell him, even if he hadn't seen her in almost a month.

He jogged to her cabin and quickly ran out of breath so he was panting when he reached her. He unconsciously pulled his shirt down to conceal himself.

"Annabeth?" He called into the cabin. She was the only one in there anyway. "Do I look different to you?"

Annabeth emerged.
1213222.title: Other

choices: So she can help Percy get fatter
12132222.content:
"Annabeth do I look good?" Percy asked.
"Yes Percy you look just fine but, I think you would look better if you keep doing what you are doing"?replyied Annabeth.
"Ok, so do you want to go mom's house so she can see the new me"?Percy asked.
Annabeth answered "yes."
12132222.title: Annabeth doesn't tell him and is a bit unco...

12133.content: So, you want yet another story for one of the strongest demigods out there in Camp Half Blood, huh? Well, your wish is my command. Just look down below for your answer?
12133.title: More

121331.content:
"Percy? Are you awake?"

The previously-sleeping demigod blinked his eyes open to the obnoxious sound of someone rapping on the door. "I am now." He groaned, shifting on his side.

"Can I come in?" The person was male, but Percy couldn't identify the voice with a sleep-clogged mind.

He mumbled a noise universally known as yes. "Just one sec'." He hopped out of his bunk, shambling to his dresser. He pulled out his normal attire (jeans, an orange Camp tee, and so on...) and threw them on. As he made his way to the door, he glanced at his mom's homemade blue cookies in a plastic container. Popping open the lid, he snatched a couple and practically moaned. They were so good– No, beyond just "good." They were devilishly good. He was tempted to just ignore whoever was calling for him and finish off the whole tub of cookies. But sadly, he knew he couldn't.

Percy breathed a sigh through his nose and moved to open the cabin door. His herald was revealed as Malcolm, who stood there and greeted him with an awkward 'good morning'. "Chiron, um, needs to see you. He's in the Big House."

Percy gave a short nod, munching on the cookies. "Okay, I'll just head there now." He stepped outside his cabin, but the son of Athena cried, "Percy–! You don't have... shoes on."

"I've got socks on." Percy shrugged laxly in response, finishing off the cookies. "Also, this probably isn't the worst I've walked on without shoes."

-----


"Percy!" Chiron clip-clopped into the room. "I apologize for sending Malcolm to wake you up, but this is... somewhat important."

"Yeah?"

His mentor nodded gravely. "Mr. D and I have... received information stating that a god or goddess may have cast a spell on the Camp as an act of revenge."

"Do you know what the spell is?"

Chiron looked hesitant. "We haven't figured it out yet, but we believe it isn't something major. Just–" He paused, his face a mask of concern and... something else Percy couldn't identify. "Be careful, my boy? If you feel anything different or strange, tell someone."

Percy shifted, suddenly feeling a bit guilty. "Um, Chiron, I'm leaving today. Back to the city. For school." He sighed. "I'm sorry, I can't help you guys."

"That's all right, child." To his surprise, the centaur smiled gently. "I, though, should be the one who's apologizing. We're dragging you into another problem. You've already done so much."

Percy smiled in return, giving a small wave. "It's fine, just give me updates, okay?" He turned to walk away, but abruptly stopped. "And I promise I'll Iris Message you right away if I feel sick, or anything different."
121331.title: Story 4

choices: Percy forgets about the promise, therefore he doesn't keep it.
1213312.content: So, you want even more choices for this story, huh? Well, who am I to turn down a person wanting more options? Just look down below for your answers?
1213312.title: More

12133122.content:
Months later, Percy was doing pretty good. He had A's and B's in every class, and he hadn't been in detention or kicked out yet! That was a new record.

But the best part by far, was the food. Dam, he'd forgotten how good juicy burgers and salty fries were. And just junk food in general.

So he may or may not have gorged himself on whenever he could find, such as a pan of his mom's rich homemade brownies, a box of greasy pepperoni pizza, or tubs of Chinese food from that really good restaurant across the street...

Tonight, like usual, he didn't even realize he ate that much until he mindlessly reached for another, only to find nothing was left. He lay on his back, fingers massaging his swollen mass of a belly, ever so often forcing out a loud belch.

Even then, when he knew he should've been full–so full-his-stomach-should've-hurt full, his stomach still growled for more, somehow emptier than before the meal. So, he slowly stood up and walked into the kitchen, one hand massaging his middle while the other roamed the fridge for something. He discovered a gallon tub of chocolate ice cream, but he realized he needed a spoon after he sat down on his bed. But his stomach howled and moaned, as if saying, No, you need this now!
12133122.title: Percy forgets about the promise, therefore he d...

choices: Percy found that he kind of likes his extra weight
Percy doesn't particularly like his new weight
121331221.content:
Percy succumbed his hunger, and like a starved animal, crammed handfuls of ice cream into his mouth. When he was finished, he licked his fingers clean and unbuttoned his suddenly too-tight jeans that cut painfully into his waist and belly. He threw the empty tub under his bed, ignoring his stomach's angry gurgle.

He laid back down, gently running his hands over his surprisingly taut, yet fleshy gut. Breathing a sigh of contentment out of his nose, he passed out into food sated slumber.

-----


Percy woke up to his mom in the hallway calling for him to get up. After a few minutes of blinking open bleary eyes and yawning, he reluctantly slid out of warm, comfy bed. He was surprised to feel slightly cooler air hit his legs, until he realized he had probably taken off his jeans during the night.

Sauntering over dresser, he pulled out some clothes. He crammed a shirt on fairly easily, (though he could feel a small breeze hit his stomach), but his jeans...

Those were a problem.

The jeans, gods. Once he managed to get them up his legs with several hops, they were practically suffocating his thighs. But when he tried to pull them up to his waist, there was an obstacle in the way.

And that's when Percy realized the obstacle was his ass.

Feeling incredibly puzzled, he stiffly walked to his vertical bathroom mirror (why did he even have one of those?), surveying his lower half.

Percy nearly choked.

His legs were huge, looking squeezed into the two or three sizes too-small jeans. They didn't touch each other though, so that was a good thing. His arms, too, were flabbier and thicker, jiggling slightly whenever he moved. His face was softer, too, with something that would soon turn into a double chin. But his belly by far had the most obvious change. It bulged out over his tight waistband, and pressed against his shirt, creating an outline of the round object. The fabric even rode up an inch, revealing a strip of tannish skin.

"Holy shit," Percy whispered to himself. "How did I let myself get this big?" He lifted the shirt over his gut, causing it to bunch up. He poked the blob experimentally, letting out a small gasp. It was soft. So soft.

He could also grab a handful of the jiggly flesh. Woah. This was weird. Percy...
121331221.title: Percy gives into his hunger

1213312211.content:
Percy was strangely fascinated with his new flabby paunch, and took to pinching, squeezing, and slapping it. Ohhhhh, he was really getting fat.

And suddenly, the only thought on his mind was I've got to get bigger. Fatter. Then Percy blinked, as another thought occurred to him. The thought didn't question why he wanted to gain more weight. The thought questioned how he was going to do it.

Lots of food. He thought, then mentally slapped himself. Well, of course he's going to need lots of food, but what else?

How about lots of food, but you add in naps after meals?

Percy's eyes lit up happily and a pleased grin sat on his lips after hearing an unknown voice offer advice in his mind. Naps would easily convert food to fat. He tilted his head down and examined his girth that bulged out a mere 5 inches over his extremely tight jean's waistband. He placed a palm on the soft globe, giving it a few small gentle pats. "I'm going to stuff so much food into you." He spoke aloud to his belly. "You better get ready."

Yes, you better get ready, Perseus. The voice spoke. You'll be nice and plump soon.

Who is the voice?
1213312211.title: Percy found that he kind of likes his extra weight

12133122111.content: Why is Adephagia fattening Percy?
12133122111.title: Adephagia, goddess of Gluttony

121331221111.content: Yes, you better get ready, Perseus. Adephagia spoke. You'll be nice and plump soon and in your rightful place at my side grand son.
121331221111.title: Cause he is her grandson

1213312211112.content: So which is it then? Your choices are down below?
1213312211112.title: Next Week / Month

choices: She wants to fatten at least two of the Children of the Big Three
121331221112.content: Her reasons for what she is doing is written down below. That and who knows she might not be working alone. Curiouser and Curiousier...............
121331221112.title: Other reasons

choices: Nico Di Angelo and Will Solace
1213312211122.content:
My sincere apologies, Olympians, Adephagia thought, cackling gleefully. It seems the great child of Poseidon, your hero, is becoming a gluttonous pig. You should not have laughed at me when I requested to be allies during the Second Giant War.

-----

3 more months later...


Percy had just finished off three boxes of meat lovers pizza and about a gallon of root beer in two hours. Currently, he was sitting– more like slumped on the couch, mindlessly watching some show on T.V, rubbing his impressively round belly.

Percy had gotten pretty lucky with his stuffing sessions during the past 6 months. His mom hadn't noticed Percy rapidly packing on pounds, nor had Paul. Both worked long shifts, and didn't come home until about midnight, which left them exhausted and they would immediately head to bed. If his mom had found out he was purposely becoming fat, she'd force him to stop faster than you could say Charybdis.

The now-overweight son of Poseidon shook his head softly, and sighed contentedly. His eyes drooped sleepily as he patted his surprisingly taut gut. He was about to fall asleep, but someone (quite annoyingly, actually) knocked on his door, then promptly rang the doorbell repeatedly. Percy groaned, and yelled, "Coming!", heaving himself off the couch with a grunt. He waddled to the door, a hand attached to his gut, which jiggled with every step due to the gallon of soda he drank. The movement caused a dull pain to shoot through his stomach, but it was nothing he couldn't handle.

Percy finally reached the door, and twisted the knob. Waiting for him outside was...
1213312211122.title: For Revenge

121332.content: How does this sound? Percy just became a god, but the offerings start to make him gain weight.
121332.title: More

122.content:
So you with Nico, huh?
Which story?
122.title: Nico

choices: All of them (Percy, Jason, Leo, Frank)
1253.title: Combos

12532.content: So you choose both the demigods of both the sky and sea, huh. Well I only have one question for you then. Which story do you choose?
12532.title: Percy and Jason

125321.content:
Percy and Jason made a bet. Who could gain the most weight in a month. It was stupid, but they were bored and had time to waste.

Percy knew his fast metabolism would mean extra work for him, but Jason was fitter to begin with. Neither told their girlfriends the plan. It was bonus points if you got your Annabeth or your Piper to notice.

The war began at dinner. Annabeth didn't question Percy's three meals in one. He'd done that one or two times before. Jason could barely stomach a second.
125321.title: Story 1

1253211.content:
Percy sought out Leo, thinking Jason was winning. He didn't feel like anything was happening. Yeah, he knew it had been just one day, but Jason had stayed stuffed the whole time.

"Hey, can you help me with something?" Percy asked Leo outside his cabin.

"Sure thing. What is it?" Percy proceeded to request a weight gain pill. Leo have him a strange look.

"Why would you need that?" Percy tried not to take offence.

"For a dare. Bet. Challenge. I just do. Can you help?"

"Probably, but why'd you come to me?" Leo gave his impish grin.

"You're the closest thing to a genius at this camp." That was enough flattery to get Leo working. He finished it that night and gave it to Percy right before dinner, promising to have more done by the morning. Their affects lasted for eight hours and included increased appetite and slower metabolism. Percy thanked him and promptly took it before sitting down to eat.

Jason didn't know about Percy's secret weapon.
1253211.title: The next day

choices: Jason finds out about the pills and asks Leo for some
Percy doesn't tell Jason about the pills
12532111.content:
Percy woke up feeling the elastic rim of his boxers being stretched and almost fell off the bed. At first, it startled and confused him. Then he remembered Leo's magical pill thing. The son of Poseidon rolled over and looked at his stomach. It was definitely squishy at least. His arms were coated in a thin layer of chub rather than tense with muscle. Annabeth would most certainly notice. Oh no. Annabeth would notice. But hey, bonus points.

Jason woke up thinking that this was harder than he'd anticipated. He was constantly uncomfortable and he wasn't seeing anything directly for it. At least Percy isn't doing any better, he thought.

Percy weighed himself after he stood up, not getting dressed yet. Wow! Almost 20 pounds in one night. He was gonna win this for sure. He slid a camp shirt on and was a bit disturbed when it didn't cover his gut and the sleeves squeezed his arms more than they had when he was muscled. His pants were the real issue. They went up to his thighs without much issue, but stopped there. It took a funny dance just to get them over his butt, and then they wouldn't zip up. He decided to leave it unzipped and just button it as best he could without crushing himself and headed out for breakfast. Annabeth had left him a note that he found on his way out. 'I won't be at breakfast or lunch today. Studying to do. XX -Wise Girl'. Perfect chance to pig out, Percy thought.

Jason didn't like how easily he fit into his clothes after it seemed like all he did was eat. He went to breakfast and was shocked to see Percy there looking obviously bigger. Jason sat down next to the son of Poseidon. .
12532111.title: Next Day

choices: Percy hides the pills and goes to eat more
Percy holds off the hunger and brags to Jason after putting the pills away
125321112.content:
How?" Was all Jason could say.

Percy just stuck his tongue out at the son of Jupiter. Jason sighed in defeat and went to his own table, shivering whatever he could into his mouth. Piper wasn't out yet, which helped his recklessness. How had Percy managed to visibly gain weight in just two days? That had to be impossible.

Percy Om nommed all he could bare, which was a lot even with the dull after effects of Leo's pill. That guy was amazing.

Percy remembered that the son of Hephaestus had said that more would be ready by morning. He went to Leo's cabin to hopefully get them and was met by an impressed looking Leo carrying a small box.

Leo nodded in approval, "I did well." He shoved the box into Percy's stomach where the older boy grabbed it.

"That's one a day for a month and a half. Didn't know how much you wanted and they were easy to make after I knew how. Try not to die." He walked back inside.

Percy took two pills and almost immediately got hungry again.
125321112.title: Percy doesn't tell Jason about the pills

1253211121.content:
In the end, the hunger was too much to resist. Percy went back and ate at least five more full breakfasts. He could almost feel himself gaining weight. If Jason had still been there it would've been suspicious.

He needed to get new clothes before he was too big for these. Lucky for him, he knew where the convenient stash in the Big House was. He grabbed a few large sizes and made it back to his cabin just before the button on his pants popped completely off. Instead of being embarrassed like he would normally be under the circumstances, Percy shed his old jeans (with much difficulty) and put on a size bigger. Even those were a bit tight, but he didn't want to spoil himself with the bigger ones. He replaced his shirt with a loose one so he didn't feel so squished around his midsection. Looking down, he saw the swell of his stomach below him and felt the pressure of two chins in his neck. His butt pressed against his pants with strength enough to make him nervous and his legs were trapped in the denim. The thickness of his arms is what got to him most, probably because that was the only bit of him not covered in fabric that he could see. They shook as he moved, and he didn't like it. Sweatshirt time.

Jason paced his room wondering how on earth the son of Poseidon had managed that he did. Not by pacing around and it eating, Jason thought. He needed to eat more and move less, but the thought of food now made him nauseous. He could wait a bit, couldn't he?
1253211121.title: Percy hides the pills and goes to eat more

choices: Jason makes Percy stop eating for a day to catch up
Percy shares his pills with Jason for a fair game
12532111212.content:
Percy had nervous dreams about Annabeth. Maybe this had been a bad idea. She hadn't shown up to dinner last night, which warranted him stuffing himself even more. It actually hurt to be full with three times the appetite of a normal person and metabolism that could barely handle one meal. Leo must've added some other things in the pills to help with that stuff.

Percy woke up and felt like a blob. His boxers were leaving imprints in his waist and love handles formed over the gentle fabric. He felt his thighs pressed together as he stood up, and he had to wait for his mind to grasp that the extra weight he was carrying was his. He stepped on the scale and had annoying difficulty seeing the number last his biking stomach. He had gained something like 50 pounds in two days. Wow. Maybe today he could take a break. NO he couldn't allow Jason to catch up with him that easily.

Percy took a pill and proceeded to put on clothes that were two sizes larger than what he's worn the day before. Those fit nicely.

Jason woke up and immediately weighed himself. He had only gained 10 pounds. It was a lot, but not compared to Percy. He knew that. What was the kid hiding?

Percy went to breakfast with all of him squishing against itself. His arms were thick and warm against his sides, his thighs rubbed against each other as he walked, his stomach was seemingly tucked into his pants and was being but in half by the waistband. Jason saw him and frowned with wicked competitiveness.
12532111212.title: Next Day

125321112122.content:
"Dude," Jason stopped Percy mid stride, "what gives?"

Percy pretended not to know what Jason was taking about, "I dunno, WHAT gives?"

Jason looked at him with that look.

"Okay fine." Percy explained to Jason about Leo and his TOTALLY NOT cheating. Jason demanded in, of course. Percy told him where the box was and went to eat.

Jason found the box under Percy's bed and grabbed a handful of the pills. He took four.

"I have to to catch up with Percy." He whispered to himself and set out for breakfast. He felt like he was starving to death as he ate twice his weight in sugary and fatty foods. He could feel his gut expanding and pressing against his pants as he ate until it poked out past his shirt. Gaining visible weight this quickly was terrifying him but YESSS if he continued like this he was so gonna win.

Percy watched Jason's form expand and paid little attention to his own. He regretted sharing his secret but that only made him need to eat more. He retrieved another of the pills from his pocket and swallowed it with his Coke. His tummy hung over his crotch and rested on his thighs which strained against his pants.

Jason's legs slowly went numb with the tightness of his pants and a pattern was cut into his gushy biceps by his camp shirt. He felt sick by the time he had given up eating.
125321112122.title: Percy shares his pills with Jason for a fair game

choices: Annabeth and Piper are staying at Camp Jupiter convenient enough for the boys
1253211121221.content:
Percy grabbed a massive handful of Leo's pills before lunch not bothering to count. He changed into larger clothes when the hunger started to kick in so he could eat for a while without too much clothing pains.

He weighed himself before he walked out and saw he's gained almost 70 pounds from when he had started. He smirked to himself and left his cabin.

Jason managed to sneak into the Big House in his way-too-tight clothes from a day before and grab some bigger ones. He dropped the new clothes on his bed and and stepped on his scale. He had gained thirty pounds just from his breakfast. He was surprised at how much he would feel it weighing him down.

Jason pulled his pants off, almost resorting to cutting them when it took five minutes. The denim print was pressed into his legs which were even still burdened with intense stretch marks. His shirt came off with the sound of popping fabric in his ears. His stomach was rounded off with stretch marks as well. He winced and poked his belly as if to make sure it was real. His finger sunk into the warm squish and it jiggled. Jason quickly covered it with his massive shirt and squeezed on his larger jeans. He grabbed one pill from the stash he had taken from Percy and swallowed it, walking out to lunch.

Percy was already there when Jason arrived. He was shivering food into his mouth almost faster than he could true. Too many of the pills gave the feeling of intense starvation that didn't go away after you ate. He felt sick, like his growing stomach was emptying itself as soon as it was filled. His body swelled as it converted almost everything he ate into body mass. His stomach popped from under his shirt and the button flew off of his jeans with the pressure. His weight pushed himself into the seat at the table. Gravity felt like it had too much against him. He knew he should stop, this wasn't worth the bet. But he couldn't. He felt like his stomach was eating itself from hunger and he just couldn't stop. The magical food-supplying plates didn't help his restriction.

Jason sat and ate about four times as much as he normally would, most of which was converted into fat for him. The stress on his pants was enough to pull the zipper down and make him uncomfortable, but the button stayed firmly in place. His face felt obviously wider and chubbier as he ate, making it feel strange to open his mouth and chew.

When Percy finally satisfied his hu
1253211121221.title: Next lunch time

choices: Percy decides to eat some more.
Percy manages to hold off his hunger.
12532111212212.content:
When Percy was finally satisfied with his hunger, it had been two hours since he began eating. He wobbled back to his cabin, his legs numb from the tightness of the pants.
After taking off all his constricting clothes (and putting on some new ones that he had prematurely stole, which were two sizes bigger than the ones before and still very tight), he was about to get on the scale when he heard a knock on the door. Slightly embarrassed by his figure, he simply yelled out, "Don't come in!!" As he spoke, he felt his fat jiggle, and couldn't help the small smile that appeared on his face.
"Uh, Percy?" The voice was Malcolm's, strong and clear and maybe a little bit confused. "I just wanted to tell you that Piper and Annabeth are a bit… held up at Camp Jupiter and are probably going to stay there for another week or two."
He paused, waiting for a response. When none came, he continued. "Uh, just thought I might tell you." At the sound of footsteps walking away, Percy breathed a sigh of relief. As much as he missed Annabeth, he was a bit worried about how she would react, and knowing that it would be a while before he saw her again both tightened and relaxed his nerves.
Percy was about to step on the scale when the box of pills caught his eye. Looking down, he was unsatisfied that he could see his feet, given he suck in a little. Walking towards the box, Percy felt his stomach rumble.
"Already?" He said aloud in shock. He had just ate 20 minutes ago! "Must be an after affect of the pill," he murmured to the open air already reaching out to grab an unknown amount of pills. He hesitated.
12532111212212.title: Annabeth and Piper are staying at Camp Jupiter ...

choices: Got up and struggle to the barracks
12533.content:
After the Argo II landed at Camp Jupiter, Percy suggested that the guys go eat at a restaurant in New Rome. They went to a place called Pasta, Pasta, and More Pasta.
"So your Percy?" asked Jason. Percy nodded. "Sorry about taking your position as praetor. Reyna said they needed another." Jason shrugged. "Ah, don't worry about it." Leo started laughing. "Dude, he takes your job and your house, and all you say is 'don't worry about it'?!" Jason looked at Leo. "Does it really matter?" he asked. "Leo held his hands up in submission. "Hey, don't blame me, it sounded funny." Frank gave Leo a high-five. "You're great, man," he said to Leo.
They walked into the restaurant and they quickly got a table. Percy looked at the menu and saw a "pasta platter supreme." "He guys," he said. "Why don't we get this? It has every type of pasta in here, and because Jason and I are praetors, everything's free." Everyone nodded. Leo put on a fake Italian accent. "Bring-a on-a de pasta!" Then he and Frank started cracking up again.
The waitress came up, and they ordered four Diet Cokes and the Pasta Platter Supreme. After a few minutes, the waitress came back with their sodas, and the pasta platter. "Whoa," said Leo. "That's a LOT of pasta." He wasn't lying. The platter had huge bowls filled with every type of pasta you can imagine. They all gapped at the platter. Finally, Percy picked up a bowl and put some Ziti on his plate. He forked some and put in his mouth. "Oh, my gods," he said with his mouth full. "This is the best pasta I've ever had!" Every one else tried some too, and they all agreed. They filled their bowls with as much assorted pasta as possible, and then chowed down.

**************************************************************************** *************************************************************

Two hours later, Percy leaned back from the table. "I am stuffed!" he declared. Leo burped in agreement. "I can't eat another bite!" Frank cradled his swollen stomach. "I can't believe we ate it all!" Jason hiccuped. "But it was -hic!- so good!" Each of them sported a rounded out stomach. The waitress walked over to drop the dessert menu on the table. Percy picked it up and saw something called a "Baklava Sundae Platter." "Waitress!" he called. "Can a get a small sample of this?" She came back with a small spoon with a little honey colored pastry and soft-serve ice cream. "He tasted it. "Oh, wow, this is good." Jason moaned. "Oh, don't tell me you're going to eat more?" Percy ordered the Baklava Sundae Platter. "Yep, you are," Jason answered himself. "No," said Percy. "So are we. You've got to have this.
The waitress returned with a platter just smalled than the Pasta platter. This had slices of the pastry in a large bowl in the middle, and various ice cream flavors on the outside. Percy forced every one to try just a spoonful. Each of them did, and instantly grabbed a bowl and filled it with some baklava and ice cream.

***************************************************

After another hour, Jason moaned and leaned back in his seat, too stuffed to move. Each of the boys had a similar expression on their faces. They...
12533.title: All of them (Percy, Jason, Leo, Frank)

125331.content:
As they got up, from their seats Jason said to Percy, "Um, how long have you been eating like this?" He poked Percy's newfound belly fat.
"I could say the same to you." Percy shot back, eyeing Jason's flab.
125331.title: Got up and struggle to the barracks

choices: Leo and Frank continue their snacking
1253311.content: Percy Jackson had finally slimmed down to having a 8 pack while the others were not so lucky. Jason had gained at LEAST 20 pounds. His face was rounded and his gut hung over his pants. Leo and Frank however were the biggest and largest of them all. Since the war was over Leo and Frank were constantly snacking on desserts at all times. There was non-stop to the eating while Percy returned to his former glory.
1253311.title: Next Week

choices: The girls don't accept their boyfriends
1253312.content:
All of the boys had gained at least 50 more pounds in the month, and they knew it. They just couldn't stop eating. The ones in a relationship have hidden from their girlfriends, but the girls were starting to get suspicious. Leo didn't care. At least he had gained some height from this as well.

The girls ganged together, assuming their boys were cheating, and decided to confront them. What that saw was not that they expected.

Annabeth had never looked better in Percy's eyes, but Percy guessed he'd never looked worse. Everything he wore had gone up two sizes and his chub was the first thing you noticed about him.

Piper and Jason locked eyes. Jason looked better than Percy, in a respect. He was taller and the weight spread itself more evenly. Jason had refused to get new clothes, so all of his fat was squished into too-tight pants and hidden under a shirt that was constantly riding up. To be fair, both boys wore it well.

Frank looked pretty much like he used to before the blessing of Mars. Just taller. Of course Hazel didn't mind.

While the boys met their girlfriends, Leo continued stuffing his face.
1253312.title: Next Month
